data: The note 'API Rate Limiting Spec' defines per-user rate limits of 1,000 requests per hour.
The note 'API Rate Limiting Spec' specifies a burst capacity of up to 100 requests in 60 seconds.
The note 'API Rate Limiting Spec' mandates returning HTTP 429 status codes when rate limits are breached.
The note 'API Rate Limiting Spec' prescribes queuing requests for up to five minutes as a fallback mechanism.
The note 'API Rate Limiting Spec' outlines rate limiting policies for integration between API Gateway, User Service, and RateLimiter.
The note 'API Rate Limiting Spec' captures high-priority business decisions on rate limiting and fallback mechanisms.
